name: CubeDudes-Farm
description:
Disconnect from the city's routine and come to this wonderful land and enjoy with  Cube Dudes the peaceful days on the farm.

Plant, harvest, raise animals and enjoy the simplicity of rural life.

Enjoy this alpha version and participate by giving your own suggestions to the content on the comments below, Cube Dudes will be glad to hear them! 

Full version soon for Android, PC and Linux

Contents planned (to become a farm game):

  • Raise and harvest crops
  • Seasons end wheather,
  • Raise livestock: chickens, cows, sheeps
  • Fishing
  • Mining
  • Gathering
  • Festivals
  • Friendship system
